casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Antonio Lamar STIMPSON 408A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 20, 2017 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, E. Burke Haywood, Special Deputy Attorney General, Wes Saunders, Assistant Attorney General, J. Douglas Henderson, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Andrew Nelson, Attorney at Law, for Stimpson, Antonio Lamar.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of December 2017 by State of NC to Substitute Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of December 2017."
